Painful Delusion.name: Painful Delusion
Painful Delusion.fullText:
Nightmare Weaver Attack 11Painful Delusion

You sink a psychic claw into your opponent’s mind, awakening its worst fears.

Encounter        Arcane, Implement, Psychic
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. Will

Hit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. Each attack that hits the target until the start of your next turn deals 5 extra psychic damage.


Published in Dragon Magazine 373, page(s) 21.
Painful Delusion.flavor: You sink a psychic claw into your opponent’s mind, awakening its worst fears.
Painful Delusion.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. Each attack that hits the target until the start of your next turn deals 5 extra psychic damage.

Dread Disappearance.name: Dread Disappearance
Dread Disappearance.fullText:
Nightmare Weaver Utility 12Dread Disappearance

To those you have cursed, you seem to disappear in a cloud of swirling darkness.

Encounter        Arcane, Illusion
Free Action      Personal

Trigger: You gain concealment from Shadow Walk.

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you are invisible to any creature affected by your Warlock’s Curse.


Published in Dragon Magazine 373, page(s) 21.
Dread Disappearance.flavor: To those you have cursed, you seem to disappear in a cloud of swirling darkness.
Dread Disappearance.trigger: You gain concealment from Shadow Walk.
Dread Disappearance.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you are invisible to any creature affected by your Warlock’s Curse.

Nightmare Stalker.name: Nightmare Stalker
Nightmare Stalker.fullText:
Nightmare Weaver Attack 20Nightmare Stalker

Using the enemy’s worst fears as a weapon, you conjure a shadowy entity to drive your foe mad with terror.

Daily        Arcane, Conjuration, Illusion, Implement, Psychic
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Effect: You conjure a Medium illusory creature that lasts until the end of your next turn. This creature can affect only the target. It appears in a square adjacent to the target and makes the following melee attack against the target. While adjacent to the creature, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls unless it is immune to fear. The target cannot move through the creature’s space, but others can. If the target misses you or one of your allies, you can use an immediate reaction to have the creature make the following melee attack against the target. If the target drops to 0 hit points, this power ends.

  Attack: Charisma vs. Will

  Hit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Sustain Minor: The creature persists until the end of your next turn, and you can move it 7 squares.


Published in Dragon Magazine 373, page(s) 21.
Nightmare Stalker.flavor: Using the enemy’s worst fears as a weapon, you conjure a shadowy entity to drive your foe mad with terror.
Nightmare Stalker.effect: You conjure a Medium illusory creature that lasts until the end of your next turn. This creature can affect only the target. It appears in a square adjacent to the target and makes the following melee attack against the target. While adjacent to the creature, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls unless it is immune to fear. The target cannot move through the creature’s space, but others can. If the target misses you or one of your allies, you can use an immediate reaction to have the creature make the following melee attack against the target. If the target drops to 0 hit points, this power ends.
Nightmare Stalker.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Nightmare Stalker.sustainMinor: The creature persists until the end of your next turn, and you can move it 7 squares.
